name: Variable with value false
instruction:
Create a variable named `isCold` and assign it the value `false`.
Create a variable named `typeOfIsCold` and assign it the type of the variable `isCold`.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what needs to be done,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const isAdult = false;
const typeOfIsAdult = typeof isAdult;
```
